txt.en: Farming represents the heart of the Shire, and farmsteads can be found throughout -- the largest of which surround the town of Michel Delving.
The pastoral peace of the Shire presents travellers with an excellent opportunity to explore its historical and cultural places.
Explore the historical and cultural places as well as the farmsteads that can be found throughout the Shire.
Explore the Farms of the Shire
Explore the Sights of the Shire
